resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105533</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105533</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Color Vision and Filters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbsehen und Filter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vision et filtres de couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visão e filtros de cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione del colore e filtri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όραμα χρώματος και φίλτρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visión y filtros de color</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Make a whole rainbow by mixing red, green, and blue light. Change the wavelength of a monochromatic beam or filter white light. View the light as a solid beam, or see the individual photons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie einen vollständigen Regenbogen, indem 
Sie rotes, grünes und blaues Licht mischen. Ändern Sie die 
Wellenlänge eines einfarbigen Lichtstrahls oder filtern Sie weißes 
Licht. Sehen Sie das Licht als fester Lichtstrahl, an oder sehen
Sie die einzelnen Photonen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rendez un arc-en-ciel entier par le mélange 
lumière rouge, verte, et bleue. Changez la longueur d'onde d'un
faisceau monochromatique ou filtrez la lumière blanche. 
Visualisez la lumière comme faisceau plein, ou voyez les 
différents photons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça um arco-íris inteiro misturando luz 
vermelha, verde, e azul. Mude o wavelength de um feixe 
monocromático ou filtre a luz branca. Veja a luz como um feixe 
contínuo, ou veja os photons individuais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Renda un Rainbow intero mescolando luce rossa, 
verde e blu. Cambi la lunghezza d'onda di un fascio 
monocromatico o filtri la luce bianca. Osservi la luce come 
fascio solido, o veda i diversi fotoni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνετε ολόκληρο ένα ουράνιο τόξο με τη μίξη του 
κόκκινου, πράσινου, και μπλε φωτός. Αλλάξτε το μήκος 
κύματος ενός μονοχρωματικού άσπρου φωτός ακτίνων ή φίλτρων. 
Εμφανίστε το φως ως στερεά ακτίνα, ή δείτε τα 
μεμονωμένα φωτόνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga un arco iris entero mezclándose luz roja, 
verde, y azul. Cambie la longitud de onda de una viga 
monocromática o filtre la luz blanca. Opinión la luz como viga
sólida, o vea los fotones individuales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105533</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/color-vision-and-filters</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
